section.title: Compatibility
section.simpara: Hue 2.4.0 runs on CentOS versions 5 to 6, and Ubuntu 10.04 to 12.10.
Hue 2.4.0 is compatible with CDH4.3. Specifically:

listitem.simpara: File Browser depends on Hadoop 0.20 (for WebHDFS/HttpFS).
Beeswax is tested against Hive 0.10.0.
Job Designer depends on Oozie 3.3, using the Oozie web service API.
